remarks: Implication of membership in the projective subspace closure function. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elpcli.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
elpcli.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
elpcliN $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ X C_ Y /\ Y e. S ) /\ Q e. ( U ` X ) ) -> Q e. Y ) $.
